TimelineJS is Knight Lab's most widely used product. TimelineJS 3 is a full rewrite designed to make this popular tool more flexible for authors and developers.

TimelineJS 3 is ready to use now. As with anything new, there will be some tweaks to get it perfect, so we are continuing to offer the original TimelineJS. Nothing will change about your current timelines, now or in the future. (Learn more about our roadmap.)

If you want to help us out, make a timeline and let us know if anything goes wrong. More technical users can help us find and fix obscure bugs.

What's new?

  • Flexible row layout: no longer limited to 3/6 rows.
  • Encapsulation: More than one timeline per page.
  • Support for very large time scales: dinosaurs! the Big Bang!
  • New media types: Dropbox images; DocumentCloud
  • Dropped support for Pagepeeker (screenshots of websites)
  • Developer features: cleaner architecture, unit tests, events.
